title: From IT to Photography: Ant Pruitt's Career Journey

excerpt: Ant is a professional photographer and podcaster for TWIT.tv His journey is a story of patience and adaptability.

html:
Ant is a professional photographer and podcaster for TWIT.tv His journey is a story of patience and adaptability.

Show Notes

Check out the Productivity in Tech YouTube Channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjoJU65IbXkKXsNqydro05Q

@kjaymiller

More Episodes and Things at https://podcast.productivityintech.com.

Want to Support the Show?
While you can't support the show directly you can support all the things Jay is up to by sponsoring him on GitHub!
https://github.com/sponsors/kjaymiller/

What is The PIT Show: Reflections and Interviews in the Tech World?

This is the show where I sit down with people in the tech space and talk about what they are doing and how they get it all done.
